website_summaries.verdict: Basic, comfortable, and affordable. A good choice if you're on a budget.
cons: Not quite as supportive as mattress-type models

customer_reviews.title: this isn't all that comfortable for anything other than a short nap I'm a ...
customer_reviews.text: By itself, this isn't all that comfortable for anything other than a short nap I'm a back and side sleeper and my shoulders hurt unless I force myself to just sleep on my back Paired this with a foam mattress pad recommended on the buy page and they go perfect together, and have been our nightly bed for over two years Just have a basic fitted sheet over both of them and this still looks and feels brand new Made moving a breeze since it just rolls up
customer_reviews.author: D J

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So comfy! I used for glamping and felt like I was in a high quality bed at home. I'm done with sleeping on backpack pads. Be prepared to have it take up some room! There's no folding away into some tiny slot. And hauling it car camping takes packing skills. Granted, I was packing for an officer's tent kind of vibe, so I knew ahead of time that I'd have to lay a seat down in my Outback.
customer_reviews.author: Annalisa

customer_reviews.title: Takes up a lot of space when rolled up.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for guests and thought it would just "roll away for easy storage" god was i wrong, the queen size is HUGE when rolled up. Guests say it's comfortable enough and seem to like it. I wish i had gotten a smaller size honestly. This thing definitely off gasses (smells) for a few weeks, i had to put it in the garage and it seemed to stop after about a few weeks. I would recommend this as long as you have the time to let it off gas before using it and are aware it does take up a good amount of space when rolled up.
customer_reviews.author: nima bean

customer_reviews.title: WRONG SIZE -_-
customer_reviews.text: We received a full sized mattress when I expected and PAID FOR A QUEEN SIZE. This was the biggest turn off for me, especially since I paid extra for the bigger size. This is why I gave it so little stars. Other than receiving the wrong size though, the mattress it self was is pretty comfortable. Easy to roll out and not to heavy either. I was worried about the smell I read in previous comments but to be honest I didn’t get anything like described in other reviews. I maybe got a faint smell of plastic but I’m guessing it’s from the heavy duty plastic bag it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: tgperez847

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for occasional use
customer_reviews.text: I have cold sensitivity from health and meds. I am disabled and use this as a camping pad for car/truck camping and its much better than anything else I have used. Its light but as I have a queen size it a bit awkward to maneuver as expected. It doesn't fluff up anymore like it did the first couple of months, even after putting it up first thing so it can have 10 to 12 hours to fluff, but its still great for the money, though I usually use on top my my air mattress for height. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Ambre P

customer_reviews.title: Does what it should
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this mat for a while now, since 2017 I believe and figured I would write a review because I base my purchasing decisions on reviews. I got this originally because my mattress was too soft, got rid of that, bought this to sleep on the floor with. It worked for a bit. Then I was tired of sleeping on the floor, so I bought a slat bed, put this mat on the bottom along with a memory foam and its the just right about of hard/soft for me and Im a side sleeper.
customer_reviews.author: SS0228

customer_reviews.title: Not very much padding
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased this about a year and a half ago and I loved it. Very comfortable, thick enough padding to feel slightly elevated off the ground. Purchased it again after moving to a different place and when I unrolled the futon, it was extremely bare. I lay down and I can already feel the floor. The batting inside feels very sparse and thin compared to the one I received before. Either their quality went downhill or their quality control isn't very good. I raved all the time about it when I purchased it the first time, but now I'm very disappointed with this new one :\
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: Being poor for a long time and moving to a new ...
customer_reviews.text: Being poor for a long time and moving to a new state, this product helped me through and through. I still use it as a buffer for a futon and it's still comfortable after almost 3 years. I do have to flip it after a while as the cotton settles to the bottom. Still, I slept on the floor with this for almost a year and it provided me with enough support to sleep well enough.
customer_reviews.author: N. Parker

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is comfortable. Storing is another issue
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is comfortable. Storing is another issue... but that's because we live in a tiny apartment. If you have space for storage, it's great. We used to have an air mattress when friends/family came over to crash, but we hated the loud noise and setup required. This is a great alternative. I occasionally sleep on it to help with my back pain. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daily sleeping mat for over a year now
customer_reviews.text: Been enjoying this thing since I bought it over a year ago. It did have a smell to it when I first opened the box but it went away after a few days of airing. Been using it daily since and I'm completely satisfied with it, and there's not many products I can say that for. It's firm and supportive. Recently I've folded it in half to fit my twin size sheet and fond it to be a softer. Being able to wedge my arm/elbow between the mat and the wall is comfort I didn't think possible (but only works best when the mat is folded)
customer_reviews.author: deraynold vickers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent For Camping
customer_reviews.text: I used this for camping on the floor as a temporary bed while helping my family member move. It slept very well, very comfortable, nice and thick so it didn’t feel like I was sleeping on the hard floor. It rolls up great with strong ties making it easier to carry but, it is a little heavy. 1 strong person can carry by themself or 2 persons if you have a bad back like myself. I managed to carry it by myself but, it is pretty bulky.
customer_reviews.author: SDP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to simplify my sleeping arrangements especially in terms of not paying rent for a bed, while not compromising on sleep quality. And this rollo-out futon fit the bill perfectly. It is perfect for small living situations (like NYC) and after a night of refreshing sleep, I simply rollup the futon and set it to the side (and occasionally use it as a low-to-theground couch) and have the whole room for other activities (like Yoga, meditation, et cetera). It has been over a month of sleeping on it and I have been getting absolutely great sleep.
customer_reviews.author: KDTF

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than a queen
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a change so I got rid of my couches and bought this. I was bummed that although it says queen size it's more like a full size mattress in size. I like the ties that are sewn onto the futon as it helps that we can tie it and nut worry about it unraveling. I highly suggest purchasing a cover as black tends to show everything. It took me a few days to adjust to the futon but it is comfortable. People have mentioned it helps with bad backs. I can't completely attest to that claim right now as I am pregnant and sleeping on my side. But my husband and kids love it so we are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Malia

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase, with only one drawback.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these, and just recommended it to a friend who has a terrible mattress. 2 cats in the house means air mattresses are a bad investment. Besides, these are better for your back and more durable. Bulky though, especially for apartment dwelling. On certain weekends I like to unroll in front of the TV and camp out. One complaint (besides the bulkiness, which I expected): it sleeps hot. You know what I mean. Turn your thermostat down, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: I spent a semester living in Japan last year and loved how easy futons were to fold up and move ...
customer_reviews.text: Just got this today. I spent a semester living in Japan last year and loved how easy futons were to fold up and move out of the way in a small apartment. I was used to sleeping on one and they can be pretty firm, so I wasn't put off by the reviews saying it could use more cushion. Sadly the reviews are definitely spot on, this would probably be best with a foam pad. My dog thinks it's the best thing ever though. She would barely stay off it long enough for me to get a sheet and is currently crashed out, after having abandoned her own bed in favor of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Davis

customer_reviews.title: Buddhist-Paleo-Minimalist, and I support this product.
customer_reviews.text: Great. Just great. Can't believe I was nervous this was going to be too thin. I was looking for a minimalist, easily stow able bed, and I've found that in this futon, but wasn't expecting it to be so luxurious. I was expecting an adjustment period, or a mental shift, a sort of glory in my own spartan temperament. Nope. Great bed. Also it arrived two days earlier than the estimated earliest possible delivery date. Hot damn. I rarely if ever write reviews, but this futon is glorious.
customer_reviews.author: Poe

customer_reviews.title: did not last long
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable at first, but wore out and became uncomfortable before a year was up. Also, the bed smelled terrible (the awful formaldehyde-new-furniture smell) when it first arrived. Had to leave it outside all day and even then I could smell it that night when I laid down on it. I wouldn't recommend this if you're looking for something to replace your bed with.
customer_reviews.author: Miles

customer_reviews.title: Your mileage may very but I like them
customer_reviews.text: It’s comfortable. Smells bad but it went away in a day for me and wasn’t unbearable despite that I’m usually sensitive to smells. I had one for 6 years and bought a second one to put on top of the first. They go flat but if you rotate and fluff them by dropping them/keeping them rolled up semi regularly it’s a non-issue. I’m too lazy to roll them up everyday though so I just flip my two over and rotate them 180 degrees whenever I change the sheet and that works.
customer_reviews.author: very cool guy

customer_reviews.title: This bed is super comfortable. I used to sleep on the carpeted ...
customer_reviews.text: This bed is super comfortable. I used to sleep on the carpeted floor on top of several blankets and could still feel the hard floor. This futon makes it so I can't feel the hard floor and gives a nice support to my back. The size of the mattress hasn't widened any more than when it first arrived but it is still enough for my purpose. My only wish is that they made the length a bit longer. And offered a king size.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Chou

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable bed ever, but...
customer_reviews.text: But if you are buying it for the reason we did (easy clean because cat wets the bed during thunderstorms) get a smaller one or two smalls to push together. No one will clean this and it doesn't fit in commercial washers. I even took a rug doctor to it and couldn't get the smell out. We will be purchasing two smalls for easier storage and cleaning. Actually, it would be awesome if these were sold with soil-proof covers.
customer_reviews.author: Asmodahlia

customer_reviews.title: It's great for camping.
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest buying 2 of them for comfort. One is ok. I prefer having them double stacked. Much more comfortable. Make sure to hang it out in the sun at least once a week. Builds up moisture that will cause mold and mildew if you don't. We're going to build a frame and have it supported with rope to keep that from happening. Then we'll only need one. Better than the ground when camping though.
customer_reviews.author: Shelene

customer_reviews.title: Great for shiatsu
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to give shiatsu massage on at my professional massage clinic. Although the futon is too bulky to travel easily, it works great if you don't have to move it around often. It fits perfectly under my massage table. The size is just slightly less than advertised but close enough. It is much cheaper than a Thai massage mat. It's very comfortable- good for many purposes.
customer_reviews.author: vflygirl

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have fibromyalgia and a bad back but I've noticed more comfort on this than when I slept on a pillow top. The queen size is great for one person but could easily manage two average sized people. It arrived way earlier than expected and didn't smell weird after I took it out of the packaging. You can also fold it up half way along a wall and use it as a couch.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Strongly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was quick and the package was good. No issues at all. This futon mattress is incredible. It is available in queen size only. I wished a King size. I use it in the living room. Very easy to use. Light weight - can be carried easily. You can roll it up, tie it and put it in a corner against the wall. Doesn't occupy much space when folded. Good enough for 2 adults to sleep comfortably. I have seen this mattress in one of my friend's house and I ordered it. Some of my friends who have seen in our house has also ordered it too. I strongly recommend you to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Anusha

customer_reviews.title: just what I wanted, and it’s 90% cotton, much healthier than most beds on here
customer_reviews.text: well stuffed, no smell, size is queen. i know because I laid it on top of my queen bed. and note: it’s 90% cotton fill, which is much healthier than all synthetic. why? synthetics react to heat by releasing gasses. when you sweat, the gasses—which are known carcinogens—are absorbed via moisture into your body thru the skin. this bed is nearly all cotton inside! ❤️
customer_reviews.author: iquanyin

customer_reviews.title: Great bed if you know what you're signing up for :)
customer_reviews.text: This rolling tatami mattress has lasted me for over a year and I still sleep like a baby. The foam of course becomes compressed overtime, however I feel that when you roll it up everyday, the foam will likely last longer as it is not constantly compressed by gravity. I bought this bed with the intention of learning to sleep on my back, and the thickness of the mattress highly incentives this goal. Sleeping on either your side of stomach may not be as comfortable, but for my intended purpose, I loved it. Very easy to move around and tie up and equally very durable. I am happy to have called this my bed for the last year.
customer_reviews.author: Vivi

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product, although the queen size is not exactly queen size. Placed on two different queen-sized mattresses to compare and even measured. A bit narrower and shorter. But the quality and comfort are great and definitely feel that got a good quality product overall. Would definitely recommend and be a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Love Avatar

customer_reviews.title: Great Futon for a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I use this on a home-made bed, with a completely flat, wooden top, and I am pretty happy but actually prefer less cushioning! My wife is just about right with this amount too, and so we are happy with this. Can seriously not beat this for the price. Also was worried about the divots, but they are flat unlike the picture depicts, and laying on it the problem is non-existent.
customer_reviews.author: Heathathon

customer_reviews.title: practiccal futon.
customer_reviews.text: Will thin out over time (> 6 months here) but that's as expected, and I've been on futons that are not cushy at all for more than 30 years. So far not too thin for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wireless Fan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & portable!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a really great spare bed. I got this first to check out whether I’d like sleeping on a shikibuton. I eventually bought an actual more pricey one from a Japanese importer. I still love this bed & it is my guest emergency bed for surprise sleepovers when I need it. It’s also quite portable and the queen size is able to go in the back of my car. I can tote it to events etc.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for use with tent rentals because i was tired of going through air mattresses and I wanted something a bit more substantial for guests. My guests love them so much that I just ordered two more. While we are going to build platforms to put them on, I only wish they came with/offered a protective cover. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: I'm a Japanese. This is a little bit different ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Japanese. This is a little bit different from Japanese futon. This is firmer than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never going back to mattress and box spring
customer_reviews.text: We got this about three months ago, and I noticed a better quality of sleep right away. It's very comfortable with just the right amount of cushion. My upper back and neck no longer ache in the morning, and I feel very well rested when I wake. A sleep partner who tosses and turns or gets up during the night will be hardly noticeable.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Remember to roll-up/fluff/rotate regularly
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is not for people that need to be reminded that you are minimalizing and next to sleeping on the floor. The more in shape your mind and body the more efficient this product... and if you're just getting started it's a great place to begin. Bed is not the place to spend your life, it's a place to recharge. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Felina Eponine Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Shocked at how comfortable it was on the floor
customer_reviews.text: Shocked at how comfortable it was on the floor. I'm a pretty big guy & the Queen size was more than big enough. If you are not a tosser/turner & a big person, you can fold it in half & get 6 inches of padding
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and a futon sofa bed as well. I have to say I love this more than futon sofa bed! It's really comfortable and rolling it up isn't too hard to do. It's easier than having to make your own bed! Also since I'm living in an apartment it does help with the limited space I do have. Really great!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: To Hell With Beds
customer_reviews.text: This was better for my back than a regular bed, and the fact that it folds up gives me an extra room for other purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Mark L. Harkins

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, comfy, comfy
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, I love it. I suspect that the manufactures of this mat just rebrands it as a japanese mat since it's pretty much a futon for your couch. Comes with an aroma of some sort on it.. smells like some sort of spice, It's not a bad smell at all so im ok with it. I will probably end up buying a futon frame to make it into a couch-bed.
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: This is quite fluffy and comfortable. It is also easy to roll up and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is quite fluffy and comfortable. It is also easy to roll up and move around, since there are straps attached. One downside is that the filling tends to become compressed and leave low spots after prolonged use.
customer_reviews.author: VLee

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this futon fow a while now and I love it. I don't have anything underneath it I just sleep with it on the floor. It's heavy and pretty thick. I weigh 140 and I'm a side sleeper, gives me plenty of padding
customer_reviews.author: Rodney W. Clemons

customer_reviews.title: A Truly Traditional Futon
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this futon because futons sold in my area all have springs. This is delightfully comfortable, and my back feels great every morning. I appreciate that it can be rolled up and moved easily if I need more room to work. This would work well for those in small living spaces. It takes only a few seconds to unroll and retire.
customer_reviews.author: Patrice

customer_reviews.title: Good guest mattress
customer_reviews.text: Does need to be aired out a bit at first as it has a definite "new product" smell. Suited our needs to be a mattress for guests. It is a bit bulky to store.
customer_reviews.author: Grace L.

customer_reviews.title: Better off sleeping on the ground.
customer_reviews.text: Feels flimsy and lo-quality. It's firm but not supportive at all. Very light. Not warm. Im better off sleeping on the ground. Serves as an area rug though. Except it's also extremely hard to disassemble and clean
customer_reviews.author: X.R.

customer_reviews.title: I now own two of these futons and love them. Super comfortable and easy to store in ...
customer_reviews.text: I now own two of these futons and love them. Super comfortable and easy to store in a closet. They even spark fond memories of living in Japan. The company also went above and beyond to reach out to me prior to mailing my order and help correct my mistake of ordering the wrong sized cover and then shipped it faster so it would still arrive on time.
customer_reviews.author: Jade Bender

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This is is an excellent mattress. My guests love it, especially since it's not super soft or squishy and is good for your back. For people used to extra soft mattresses a simple duvet on top solves any discomfort. I prefer this mattress to my own bed.
customer_reviews.author: Customer-san

customer_reviews.title: Better than the floor, better than an air mattress and crappy mattresses.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my partner and I because we had taken to sleeping on the floor- we usually just slept on some blankets ontop of carpet and it really started helping our backs. However, my back started to get bad again but I did not want to go back to my old toss and turn mattress. So buying this was a very happy medium. I think it feels very comfortable for sleeping on the floor and I would much rather sleep on it than an air mattress. This will be our second night on it, so I’d like to see how the filling in the mattress holds up. I will definitely update later on.
customer_reviews.author: PataskalaFamily

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of the back pain
customer_reviews.text: I sleep on the floor covered by gym mats. This futon is so comfortable. The first couple of weeks I couldn't fall asleep, because it takes time to get used to sleeping on the floor, but after purchasing this product, every morning I feel well-rested. it's thick enough for keeping your body warm even if you sleep on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Foam Futons By Far
customer_reviews.text: The futon was great and so I added another one to make it a two futon queen bed. It was a nice early gift from my parents. With a small bedroom it is great to roll up during the day while busy at your computer for work thereafter. It is a far cry better than spending $80/90 for a foam futon that sags in the center.
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.text: What a shame! Couldn't give any more stars than 5. Overall: This product is really good and the best option when it comes to mattresses imho. I am so done with those over priced spring mattresses which test each bone in your back. In fact, I ordered two of these in queen and twin and have had very good sleep indeed. It is pretty soft and portable and also has nice extensions to tie up the mattress. I won't go as far to say you shall sleep like a baby and all that marketing BS but personally I felt this was the best mattress I could have wished for myself for a good night's sleep.
customer_reviews.author: zoomon

customer_reviews.title: Useful floor mattress for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Good sized roll out floor mattress. Concern is long-term durability. Provides great sleep and very useful for toddlers. Heavier adults tend to flatten the mattress filling.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: BUY IT!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Extremely comfy, easy to stored, pack up or move. Easy to clean with the removable outer cover. Great price too. Definitely worth every penny! I highly recommend this and I will definitely be buying more in different colors sometime in the near future. Product is exactly as shown in picture and this would be perfect for camping too in place of stupid sleeping bags
customer_reviews.author: Ngoc Le

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable even as only bedding.
customer_reviews.text: This arrived very quickly, and very well packaged, there was no damage to the box or the bag, and the mattress was not compressed at all. When first unwrapping it, if I put my nose right up to it, there is a slight pesticide smell, but it dissipated within hours of unwrapping it. It's very comfortable, and easy to fold up when not in use, the ties make it simple to keep it rolled out of the way. We use it to sleep on nightly. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Greenfire

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's shipped from California and the expected date was six to twelve days. Living in Illinois,I got it in five days! The futon mattress is worth the price. If you're using the futon as a every day sleeping mattress, I would pick up a D&D fold up mattress as well.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: We use it for camping in our tent we love it size is fairly true to a queen wish it had a bag outside of the plastic one it came in other then that it rocks
customer_reviews.author: benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Feels a lot like what I slept on in Japan
customer_reviews.text: Feels a lot like what I slept on in Japan. Good size for two, rolls up and cleans up well. It's firm and flat, but still soft enough to be cozy. I have a pretty bad back, and this has been really great for sleep and stretches. We have wood floors, so I may still buy an additional mattress pad to go on top of it just for extra comfort--prolly wouldn't need it if we had carpet/tatami underneath it. We've had it for a couple months and we sleep on it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Warner

customer_reviews.title: Great sleep!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband (weekend seasonal job involving camping) & even though he's only used it twice, he said he slept better on it last weekend than he did all week at home in our bed! =) I made sure to tell him to roll it up (like other reviewers have stated). Very happy so far! And got here way faster than expected! I'll be recommending this to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: cleo1313

customer_reviews.title: This is Very Large
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a back up for Airbnb Business. I should have gotten a twin, but the product itself is a good buy. I would not buy black again, it shows up lint like crazy. If you have the room great.
customer_reviews.author: dusty Z

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made though
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my trailer. Set it on top of the cushions and after the 3rd night my knees hurt in the morning. Going to put a piece of plywood underneath to see if that helps. Nicely made though, no odor like with the foam toppers. Arrived within two days, much earlier than promised, free shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Coloradoan

customer_reviews.title: Best choice ever!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I loved this new bed! It’s super comfortable and it makes sleeping on the floor so much better for our backs. Definitely will recommend this to others!
customer_reviews.author: Edisa A.

customer_reviews.title: could use a denser material for support
customer_reviews.text: this is a great option for the kids to used during sleep overs but is not suitable for heavier people, it compresses easy and you can feel the floor on your pressure points which leaves you sore by morning
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell
customer_reviews.text: I sae this and thought it would be great for mocie nights for ny kids. When I opened it to try out, they loved it, until they smelled it. The stench was so bad and I coukd not get rid of it. My husband ended up getting rid of it. Worst purchase from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: meh...ive had better

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this sleeping pad for a couple months and I have no complaints. I’ve slept better on it than I have a pillow top mattress. If you want it to stay fluffy just shake it out a little bit everyday. Some people complained about the brand new smell in some other reviews, so the first thing I did was spray it with febreeze and let it air out. Super happy with it. Definelty worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cody Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Know what you're buying and you'll be satisfied
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely a bit different from a regular mattress. You should be aware of what you're purchasing before you get it. However, the harder surface provided helps my sleeping trouble and is more comfortable to me. The ease of moving it also makes it nice to have when hosting company in a smaller room.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis G

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Used it for about a year and found it to be very comfortable. I'm not a fan of overly soft mattresses and this one, because I had it resting on the floor, had a nice firmness that was cushioned with the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J Fritschle

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Bed
customer_reviews.text: I sleep on this every night! Yes, it's firm, but I love firm mattresses. Sleeping on a hardwood floor doesn't make it too hard either. I live in a small room, so being able to fold it up every night is really important to me. There's no way I could have a normal queen bed in this room, but now I can. It's very light and easy to move around.
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: fantastic futon!
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 of these futons and they are really comfortable. they are very versatile and i bought some as gifts for my family.
customer_reviews.author: qwerty

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great bed, will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Solid but still soft enough to be comfortable. Bought a Queen and a Full and 3 of the foam mattresses from this company. Foam by itself was nice and soft but putting these futons on top made a perfect bed. I was worried about hang to air these out for a couple of days because of all the reviews about the smell, but once I got it out of the vacuumed plastic, there was no bad smell, just normal fresh bedding/blanket smell.

Solid build quality, reasonable price, very comfortable, especially on top of carpet.
